articles.title: Families of Fallen Fighters of CPV Feted
articles.content:
Families of Fallen Fighters of CPV Feted
 Pyongyang, May 6 (KCNA) -- The DPRK Ministry of the People's Armed Forces Thursday gave a reception for the visiting delegation of families of fallen fighters of the Chinese People's Volunteers. 
					 Present at the reception on invitation were members of the delegation headed by Guan Youfei, deputy director of the Foreign Affairs Office of the Ministry of National Defense, Charge d' Affaires ad Interim Hao Xiaofei, Military, Naval and Air Attache Sun Yanfeng and staff members of the Chinese embassy here.
					
					 Pak Jae Gyong, vice-minister of the People's Armed Forces, general officers and officers of the Korean People's Army were on hand.
					
					 Speeches were made there.

articles.title: Gift  from Families of Fallen Fighters of CPV
articles.content:
Gift  from Families of Fallen Fighters of CPV
 Pyongyang, May 6 (KCNA) -- General Secretary Kim Jong Il was presented with a gift by the visiting delegation of families of fallen fighters of the Chinese People's Volunteers. 
					 The gift was handed over to an official concerned by Guan Youfei, deputy director of the Foreign Affairs Office of the Ministry of National Defense who is heading the delegation, on Thursday.

articles.title: Friendly Meeting Held at Indonesian Embassy
articles.content:
Friendly Meeting Held at Indonesian Embassy
 Pyongyang, May 6 (KCNA) -- A friendly meeting took place at the Indonesian embassy here on Thursday 45 years after General Secretary Kim Jong Il paid a visit to Indonesia in company with President Kim Il Sung. 
					 Present there on invitation were Jon Yong Jin, vice-chairman of the Korean Committee for Cultural Relations with Foreign Countries and chairman of the DPRK-Indonesia Friendship Association, and members of the association.
					
					 Charge d'Affaires a.i. Fitri Riyanti and staff members of the embassy were on hand.
					
					 Speakers at the meeting said that the visit marked a historic event that opened a new chapter in the friendship between the DPRK and Indonesia.
					
					 They expressed belief that the long-standing friendly relations between the two countries would grow stronger in the days ahead.
					
					 The participants appreciated an art performance of members of the embassy and Korean pupils and watched an Indonesian documentary film.

articles.title: Day of DPRK-Cuba Friendship Observed
articles.content:
Day of DPRK-Cuba Friendship Observed
 Pyongyang, May 6 (KCNA) -- A Cuban fine art work exhibition and film show took place at the Cuban embassy here on Thursday on the occasion of the 50th anniversary of the establishment of diplomatic ties between the DPRK and Cuba.
					 Present there on invitation were officials of the DPRK Foreign Ministry, the Korean Committee for Cultural Relations with Foreign Countries and Pyongyang University of Foreign Studies.
					
					 Ambassador Jose Manuel Galego Montano and staff members of the Cuban embassy were on hand.
					
					 Jose Manuel Galego Montano made a speech and the participants went round fine art works introducing buildings in Cuba and its natural sceneries and watched a Cuban documentary film.
					
					 That day the Cuban embassy donated Cuban books to Pyongyang University of Foreign Studies.

articles.title: Briefing on Young People's RC Activities Held
articles.content:
Briefing on Young People's RC Activities Held
 Pyongyang, May 6 (KCNA) -- Red Cross activities of young volunteers have begun in the Democratic People's Republic of Korea on Thursday in conjunction with the month of preventing accidents (May).
					 A function took place in Sambong-ri, Phyongwon County, South Phyongan Province, to mark the beginning of the activities.
					
					 Present at the function were officials of the Central Committee of the Red Cross Society of the DPRK and its branch of South Phyongan Province, young volunteers and a member of the delegation of the International Federation of Red Cross and Red Crescent Societies working in the DPRK.
					
					 An explanation was given with regard to observing traffic regulations willingly, to be followed by a question-and-answer session on the prevention of traffic accidents and an art performance of young volunteers.

articles.title: Social Science Book in Print
articles.content:
Social Science Book in Print
 Pyongyang, May 6 (KCNA) -- A serial book titled "Collection of Korean Social Science Works" has been compiled and published by the Academy of Social Sciences of the Democratic People's Republic of Korea.
					 The book deals with all the successes the country has made in social science on the basis of the immortal Juche idea.
					
					 Contained in the series are books, treatises and other valuable works written by academicians, candidate academicians, professors and doctors renowned in social science circles of the country, including Hong Ki Mun and Kim Sok Hyong.
					
					 The collection, the first of its kind in the country, is composed of the revolutionary history of the three commanders of Mt. Paektu -- President Kim Il Sung, General Secretary Kim Jong Il and anti-Japanese heroine Kim Jong Suk -- philosophy, economics, law, linguistics, literature, history, national classics, folklore and archaeology.
					
					 Several hundred volumes of the series have been compiled and some 50 volumes have already come out.
					
					 The publication of the already compiled volumes will be concluded in 2012 marking the 100th birth anniversary of President Kim Il Sung, and the compilation of the book will be continued, replenished by new successes.

articles.title: National Classic "Nyongbyonji"
articles.content:
National Classic "Nyongbyonji"
 Pyongyang, May 6 (KCNA) -- Preserved in the Democratic People's Republic of Korea are many documentary heritages illustrative of the wisdom and talents of the Korean nation.
					 Among them is "Nyongbyonji" (a record book of Nyongbyon Town).
					
					 It was compiled in the middle of the 18th century. Being lost, it was reedited later to be handed down up to now.
					
					 The book, made up of two volumes, deals with the town's location, history, mountains, rivers, mineral waters, markets, historic spots, signal fire posts, lookouts, land, lakes, products, local schools annexed to the Confucian shrine, customs, famous servicemen, collections of poems and so on.
					
					 It also gives a fairly detailed description of Tangun, the father of Ancient Korea, and King Tongmyong, the founder of Koguryo.
					
					 What is conspicuous is that 16 Sinji characters created in the period of Ancient Korea were used in the book.
					
					 The book is of significance in studying not only the history of the Nyongbyon area but that of ancient and medieval times of Korea.

articles.title: S. Korea's Conception of "Principal Enemy" Slammed
articles.content:
S. Korea's Conception of "Principal Enemy" Slammed
 Pyongyang, May 6 (KCNA) -- The "Committee for Promoting Defense Reform", a mechanism under the south Korean puppet minister of Defense, was recently reported to have contemplated a proposal for including in the "defense white paper" the conception that the "north is the principal enemy."
					 In this regard Minju Joson Thursday observes in a signed commentary:
					
					 The above-said move of the conservative ruling forces of south Korea cannot be construed otherwise than an intention to stipulate a scenario for a war against the DPRK in a document. This is, therefore, an intolerable act of treachery to bring the disaster of a new war, a nuclear war, to all Koreans.
					
					 Such move goes to clearly tell who is wholly to blame for having pushed to an extreme phase the inter-Korean relations which had favorably developed since the publication of the June 15 joint declaration, the commentary notes, and goes on:
					
					 Having strained the north-south relations and driven them into an unpredictably extreme phase, quite contrary to national reconciliation and unity, the conservative group is now busy working out an official document which contains the conception that "the north is the principal enemy" so that it may be known worldwide in a bid to escalate the confrontation with fellow countrymen and provoke a war of aggression against the DPRK.
					
					 The warlike nature of the conservative group finds its vivid manifestation in the anti-DPRK "human rights" campaign.
					
					 This group is leaving no means untried to ignite a war against the DPRK.
					
					 The conservative group has found itself in a tight corner due to its traitorous, anti-reunification and unpopular rule since it came to power. It is now seeking a way out of the crisis in the war of aggression against the DPRK. This is, however, nothing but death-bed frenzy.
					
					 The group would be well advised to behave itself, though belatedly, mindful of the consequences to be entailed by its moves to escalate the confrontation with fellow countrymen.

articles.title: Rodong Sinmun on Unearthed Art Works Depicting Kim Il Sung
articles.content:
Rodong Sinmun on Unearthed Art Works Depicting Kim Il Sung
 Pyongyang, May 6 (KCNA) -- The recent discovery of fine art works depicting President
					 Kim Il Sung created and distributed in the period of the anti-Japanese armed struggle is, indeed, of weighty importance not only in the history of the Juche-oriented fine art but the history of the development of the Juche-oriented literature and arts.
					 Rodong Sinmun Thursday says this in a signed article.
					
					 It goes on:
					
					 The above-said fine art works serve as a precious historic treasure that helps make the roots of the Juche-oriented literature and arts stronger. 
					
					 The discovery of those works makes it possible for the Juche-oriented literature and arts to scientifically clarify and ascertain the historical origin of creating works portraying the leader in the field of fine art as well as in the fields of literature and music.
					
					 The fine art works portraying the President dating back to the period of the anti-Japanese armed struggle highly laud him as a central figure in the national liberation struggle and the invincible and iron-willed commander who led huge enemy troops by the nose. 
					
					 These works truthfully deal with the noble traits of the President who left lots of legends about his love for people behind, sharing weal and woe with them in the whole period of the anti-Japanese armed struggle.
					
					 Noting that the DPRK's tradition of the revolutionary literature and arts represents the tradition of the Songun revolutionary literature and arts the roots of which struck despite the tempest of Songun, the article says:
					
					 The fact that those who gave an origin to the fine art works portraying the leader in Korea were servicepersons of the Korean People's Revolutionary Army goes to prove once again the truth of the Songun revolutionary cause and its great vitality.
					
					 Kim Jong Suk, an anti-Japanese heroine, was a great pioneer of the anti-Japanese revolutionary fine art and a forerunner in creating fine art works depicting the leader, the article notes, and goes on: 
					
					 Embroidery "Thinking of Motherland" done by her is a precious fine art work portraying the leader, reflecting the Korean people's profound reverence for Kim Il Sung.

articles.title: Stronger Unity and Alliance Called for
articles.content:
Stronger Unity and Alliance Called for
 Pyongyang, May 6 (KCNA) -- All Koreans in the north and the south and overseas will boost solidarity and alliance nationwide and reenergize the reunification movement and thus bring earlier the day of independent reunification, peace and prosperity without fail, stresses Rodong Sinmun Thursday. 
					 In a signed article the daily goes on to say:
					
					 When all Koreans in the north and the south and overseas single-mindedly unite and strengthen solidarity and alliance on this basis, this will help find a solution to the fundamental issue in reunifying the country and lead to the smooth settlement of other issues.
					
					 This is proved by the successes achieved by the fellow countrymen in their dynamic struggle for achieving the unity of the entire nation under the banner of "By our nation itself" after the publication of the historic June 15 joint declaration.
					
					 It is beyond any doubt that a greater advance can be made in the efforts to accomplish the cause of reunification when all Koreans achieve solidarity and alliance and take joint actions with their patriotic efforts and enthusiasm to attain reunification.
					
					 They should steadily intensify the reunification movement while positively pursuing visits and contacts, dialogue and solidarity and alliance in the idea of "By our nation itself".
					
					 All the reunification movement organizations and compatriots of different circles in the north and the south and overseas should develop on a new higher stage the solidarity and alliance centering around All-Korean Committee for Implementation of June 15 Joint Declaration, an umbrella organization for solidarity in the nationwide reunification movement.
					
					 The people from all walks of life at home and abroad can foil any move against reunification when they go united close as a patriotic force, boost solidarity and take dynamic joint actions.

articles.title: Pakistani Figure Praises Kim Il Sung
articles.content:
Pakistani Figure Praises Kim Il Sung
 Pyongyang, May 6 (KCNA) -- Nisar Ahmed Khuhro, who visited the DPRK at the head of a delegation of the Pakistani preparatory committee for commemorating the centenary of birth of President Kim Il Sung, expressed boundless reverence for the President, saying that thanks to his wise leadership the DPRK could be turned into a socialist power.
					 Kim Il Sung, founder of the great Juche idea, indicated the road to be followed by progressive humankind, he said, and went on:
					
					 Kim Il Sung was an outstanding leader of not only the Korean people but of the world progressives.
					
					 Progressive humankind speaks highly of his greatness.
					
					 We visited the International Friendship Exhibition House while staying in the DPRK.
					
					 Displayed at the house are valuable gifts presented by heads of party, state and government of so many countries and prominent figures to the President.
					
					 Looking round the gifts, we felt deeper reverence for the President.
					
					This veneration of mankind for the President will remain unchanged despite the flow of time. 
					
					 Joining the world progressives in commemorating the centenary of birth of the President, we will hold diverse political and cultural events and conduct a widespread solidarity movement supporting the Korean people's just cause. 
					
					Rosy is the future of the DPRK as it is led by General Secretary Kim Jong Il who has creditably carried forward the revolutionary cause of the President, concluded the Pakistani figure.

articles.title: Koreans' Protest against Discrimination Policy in Japan
articles.content:
Koreans' Protest against Discrimination Policy in Japan
 Pyongyang, May 6 (KCNA) -- The actions of Koreans in Japan are going on in different parts of Japan in protest against the Japanese authorities' moves to obliterate their national education.
					 The Korean Youth League in Japan (Jochong), the Korean Youth Commercial Association in Japan (Chongsanghoe) and the Korean Students Union in Japan (Ryuhakdong) jointly launched information service and signature campaign and other activities in Tokyo, Nishi Tokyo, Saitama, Kanagawa, Chiba, Gunma, Hyogo, Kyoto and Aichi on April 23 and 24.
					
					 Teachers and students of Kyushu Korean Senior Middle School conducted information service on April 24, urging the Japanese authorities to include the Korean schools in the tuition-free program for senior middle schools without discrimination.
					
					 That day those concerned with the Korean schools and other Korean residents and Japanese in Aichi Prefecture called an emergency meeting at which they adopted a resolution calling for jointly protecting the future of the students studying at the Korean schools.
					
					 Jochong, Chongsanghoe and Ryuhakdong in Osaka on joint actions against the moves of the Japanese authorities to obliterate the national education of Koreans conducted street information service on April 28.
					
					 Earlier, 25 civic organizations of Japan held an emergency meeting in Tokyo.
					
					 The organizations at the meeting called on all the Koreans and Japanese in the region to disclose and condemn in concert the injustice of Japan's policy of discriminating against the Korean schools and stage solidarity actions to cope with the grave situation.
					
					 Written requests to the prime minister and the minister of Education, Culture, Sports, Science and Technology of Japan were adopted at the meeting.

articles.title: DPRK's Army Day Observed
articles.content:
DPRK's Army Day Observed
 Pyongyang, May 6 (KCNA) -- Meetings, seminars and film shows took place in China, Cuba, Egypt and Indonesia between April 24 and 29 to mark the 78th founding anniversary of the Korean People's Army.
					 Speeches were made there.
					
					 The chairman of the Cuban preparatory committee for commemorating the centenary of birth of President Kim Il Sung in his speech at a meeting referred in detail to the immortal exploits performed by the President for the country and the revolution.
					
					 The U.S. imperialists and the south Korean puppet clique are becoming evermore undisguised in their moves against reunification but Cuba will do all it can to contribute to accomplishing the cause of reunification of Korea to which the President dedicated his whole life and which is wisely led by General Secretary Kim Jong Il, he added.
					
					 The chairman of the Egyptian Committee for the Study of the Juche Idea said at a seminar that the President embarked on the road of revolution in his early years, fathering the Juche idea, the Songun idea, and founded the Korean People's Revolutionary Army and thus accomplished the historic cause of national liberation through an armed struggle.
					
					 He stressed that under the wise leadership of Kim Jong Il, successor to the President's cause of Songun, the KPA has grown to be invincible revolutionary armed forces. 
					
					 The participants of the film shows watched such Korean films as "Reply of Korea" and "Arms of Korea".

articles.title: Foreign Ministry Memorandum Supported
articles.content:
Foreign Ministry Memorandum Supported
 Pyongyang, May 6 (KCNA) -- Hasanul Huq Inu, chairman of the Central Executive Committee of the Bangladesh National Socialist  Party, released a statement on April 29 in support of the memorandum of the DPRK Foreign Ministry.
					 The statement said:
					
					 We will as ever support the steadfast stand of the government of the DPRK to build a durable peace regime on the Korean Peninsula and denuclearize the peninsula.
					
					 It is our hope that the nuclear forces of the DPRK will deter and beat back any aggression and attack on it till the Korean Peninsula and the rest of the world are denuclearized.
					
					 The DPRK has consistently maintained its policy that it will not use nukes against non-nuclear states or threaten them with those weapons unless they are involved in aggression or attack on it in collusion with a nuclear weapons state.
					
					 We are of the view that the DPRK is willing to join in the international efforts for nuclear non-proliferation and safe handling of nuclear substance on an equal footing with other nuclear weapons states.
					
					 Under the prevailing situation, we call upon all peace-loving people of the world to go united to wage a dynamic struggle against the plots of the imperialists to violate the sovereignty of other countries.

articles.title: Encuentro de amistad en embajada indonesia en Corea
articles.content:
Encuentro de amistad en embajada indonesia en Corea
Pyongyang, 6 de mayo (ATCC) -- En ocasion del 45o aniversario de la visita a la Republica de Indonesia realizada por el Dirigente Kim Jong Il junto con el Presidente Kim Il Sung, tuvo lugar el dia 6 un encuentro de amistad en la embajada de Indonesia en Corea.
					Fueron invitados a la ocasion Jon Yong Jin, vicepresidente del Comite Coreano de Relaciones Culturales con el Extranjero y presidente de la Asociacion de Amistad Corea-Indonesia, y otros miembros de esta entidad.
					
					Tambien estuvieron presentes la encargada de negocios a. i. Fitri Riyanti y otros miembros de la embajada indonesia.
					
					Los oradores senalaron que la visita a Indonesia realizada por el Dirigente Kim Jong Il con el Presidente Kim Il Sung fue un evento historico que abrio la nueva pagina de amistad entre ambos paises.
					
					Expresaron sus convicciones de que se consolidaran en lo adelante las relaciones de amistad de larga historia entre ambos paises. 
					
					Los participantes vieron la funcion artistica de miembros de la embajada indonesia y alumnos coreanos y un documental indonesio.

articles.title: Exhibicion de bellas artes y proyeccion filmica de Cuba
articles.content:
Exhibicion de bellas artes y proyeccion filmica de Cuba
Pyongyang, 6 de mayo (ATCC) -- Tuvieron lugar el dia 6 en la embajada cubana en Corea la exhibicion de bellas artes y la proyeccion filmica dedicadas al 50o aniversario del establecimiento de las relaciones diplomaticas entre la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea y la Republica de Cuba.
					 Fueron invitados los funcionarios del Ministerio de Relaciones Exteriores, el Comite Coreano de Relaciones Culturales con el Extranjero y la Universidad de Lenguas Extranjeras de Pyongyang. 
					
					 Estuvieron presentes el embajador Jose Manuel Galego Montano y otros miembros de la sede diplomatica cubana. 
					
					 El embajador cubano hizo uso de la palabra.
					
					Luego, los participantes vieron las obras de bellas artes que muestran los edificios y paisajes naturales de Cuba y un documental cubano.
					
					 El mismo dia, la embajada cubana dono libros de su pais a la Universidad de Lenguas Extranjeras de Pyongyang.

articles.title: Minju Joson condena reaparicion de la teoria de "enemigo principal"
articles.content:
Minju Joson condena reaparicion de la teoria de "enemigo principal"
Pyongyang, 6 de mayo (ATCC) -- Ultimamente, el "comite de promocion de la reforma de defensa nacional", organismo consultivo adscrito directamente al ministro titere de Defensa Nacional del Sur de Corea, esta discutiendo el proyecto de anotar en la "carta blanca de defensa nacional" la concepcion de que "el Norte es el enemigo principal".
					 Este intento deviene un imperdonable acto traidor encaminado a hacer sufrir a toda la nacion los desastres de la nueva guerra, la nuclear, porque oficializaria en documento la voluntad de enfrentarse con armas con la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea.
					
					 Asi senala el periodico Minju Joson en un comentario individual del dia 6 y continua:
					
					 Las pretensiones de la banda de conservadores surcoreanos de revalidar la teoria del "enemigo principal" demuestran claramente quien es el autor que empeoro extremadamente como ahora las relaciones Norte-Sur que se desarrollaban favorablemente despues de la publicacion de la Declaracion Conjunta del 15 de Junio.
					
					 Esa banda, que llevo las relaciones intercoreanas  a la fase de imprevisible desenlace en vez de esforzarse por la reconciliacion y unidad nacionales, persigue la confrontacion fratricida y la provocacion de guerra de agresion a la RPDC tratando de anunciar a todo el mundo a traves de un documento oficial que el Norte es su enemigo principal.
					
					 La naturaleza belicista de ella se revela fehacientemente en su campana intrigante anti-RPDC en materia de "derechos humanos".
					
					 Esos conservadores no reparan ahora en medios ni en metodos para desencadenar la guerra de agresion a la RPDC.
					
					 Resultaria el ultimo el esfuerzo de la camarilla de titeres surcoreanos por buscar en la guerra anti-RPDC la salida de la crisis en que ha caido debido a su politica antinacional, anti-reunificacion y antipopular que vino practicando desde su llegada al poder.
					
					Seria conveniente a ella portarse con prudencia desde ahora reflexionando seriamente de las consecuencias que emanaran de sus maniobras en pro de la confrontacion fratricida.

articles.title: Rodong Sinmun exhorta a activar movimiento por la reunificacion
articles.content:
Rodong Sinmun exhorta a activar movimiento por la reunificacion
Pyongyang, 6 de mayo (ATCC) -- Toda la nacion coreana del Norte y el Sur de Corea y en ultramar debe fortalecer en la escala pannacional la solidaridad y la alianza y activar el movimiento por la reunificacion para asi adelantar sin falta la nueva manana de la reunificacion independiente, la paz y la prosperidad.
					Asi senala el diario Rodong Sinmun en un articulo individual difundido este jueves y continua:
					
					Si todos los coreanos del Norte, el Sur y en ultramar unen sus almas y a base de esto, fortalecen la solidaridad y la alianza, es posible resolver el problema fundamental por lograr la reunificacion de la patria y, a la larga, solucionar facilmente los demas problemas.
					
					Lo prueban los exitos logrados por los connacionales en el proceso de la energica lucha por realizar la unidad pannacional bajo la bandera "Entre nosotros, los connacionales" despues de ser publicada la historica Declaracion Conjunta del 15 de Junio.
					
					No cabe duda que cuando todos los coreanos se solidaricen y se unan dedicando sus fuerzas y entusiasmo por la reunificacion y den los mismos pasos y acciones, podran lograr el mayor avance en el cumplimiento de la causa de la reunificacion.
					
					Bajo el ideal "Entre nosotros, los connacionales", todos los coreanos del Norte y el Sur de Corea y en ultramar deben realizar activamente visitas, contactos, dialogo, solidaridad y alianza y fortalecer continuamente el movimiento por la reunificacion de la patria.
					
					Las entidades del movimiento por la reunificacion y los connacionales de distintos sectores del Norte, el Sur y en ultramar deben ampliar y desarrollar en mas alto nivel la solidaridad y la alianza tomando por centro el Comite Conjunto Nacional del 15 de Junio, organizacion pannacional de solidaridad del movimiento por la reunificacion.
					
					Cuando los connacionales fortalecen la solidaridad, unidos solidamente como una fuerza patriotica y toman activamente las acciones conjuntas, podran frustrar cualesquier maquinaciones anti-reunificacion.
